name: moin-ui
description: MoinUI 墨影UI - macOS SwiftUI 组件库

scripts.test: swift test --enable-code-coverage 2>&1 | grep -v -E '(CoreData|XPC|started|passed|^Test Case|^Test Suite.*passed|^\s*Executed.*with 0 failure)' | grep -v '^$' || true && pnpm test:coverage
scripts.test:coverage:html: xcrun llvm-cov show .build/debug/MoinPackageTests.xctest/Contents/MacOS/MoinPackageTests --instr-profile=.build/debug/codecov/default.profdata --sources Sources/MoinUI --format=html > coverage.html && open coverage.html
scripts.release: pnpm gen-version && git add Sources/MoinUI/Utils/Version.swift && echo '版本文件已生成，请提交并创建tag推送'

author: phantomdancer
